Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants where both activities occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in the context of major revision cycles
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Cycle time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 defined as the duration between its occurrence and the next subsequent reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Declined compared to the average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Total resolution time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 measured until the final disposition of the reviewer (agreed, declined, or no response) is recorded
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer No Response in cases where reviewers ultimately fail to respond
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Elapsed time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-AE Assign Reviewers in variants where reassignment occurs after the reminder
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to the next Reviewer Invitation Reminder (if any) indicating escalation due to non-response
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in end-to-end review paths that reach editorial recommendation
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Cycle time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 compared to the cycle time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 within the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in resubmission loops triggered after reviewer agreement
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Time elapsed from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include at least one major or minor revision loop
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Reviewer Agreed following Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2, grouped by case:concept:name
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
